article_title: Michelle Obama absolutely kills it in the “Evolution of Mom Dancing Part 2″
article_text:
Topics: Entertainment, Late Night With Jimmy Fallon, Michelle Obama, Video, Viral Video, Entertainment News, Politics News

We weren’t ready for her the first time she destroyed the dance floor with her hilarious “Mom Dancing.” Now, Michelle Obama is back for an encore, picking up where she left off with some new show-stealing moves like “Can We Turn the AC Up?” and the “Getting A Bag From Your Collection of Plastic Bags Under the Sink.” It’s been two years, but FLOTUS has still got it. And Jimmy has still got … that same pink cardigan and pair of khakis.

Watch the clip below:
